remark.en: Combine Course: PE2301A. Restrict to senior who haven‘t taken this course before.
remark.ch: 限修畢兩門大一體育及三門體育必修興趣選課且未修過健身運動之學生，與課號PE2301A同班授課。研究生選修者請於人工加退選期間至體育室教學組辦理加簽。

goal.en: 1. Exercise your body to fully develop your physique and physical fitness. 2. Encourage students to engage in physical exercise and cultivate correct lifelong exercise habits. 3. Strengthen muscle strength, cardiopulmonary endurance, enhance visceral function, and achieve fitness goals.
goal.ch: 一、 鍛鍊身體，使體格與體能得以充分發展。 二、 激勵學生從事體能鍛鍊，培養正確終身運動習慣。 三、 加強肌力、心肺耐力，增強內臟機能，達到健身之目的。

content.en:
1. (1) Explanation of class progress and precautions. (2)Introduce the basic concepts of fitness exercises.
2. Physical fitness test (T-shaped agility, Illinois agility, 30m, standing on one foot with eyes closed).
3. Operation instructions and experience of upper and lower limb weight training equipment.
4. Explain the method of testing maximum muscle strength and actually test it.
5. Heavy training equipment circuit training (group operation, 3 x 30s x 8 movements).
6. Quick strength training, pyramid training.
7. Teaching and experience of open weight training equipment (upper limbs).
8. Teaching and experience of open weight training equipment (lower limbs).
9. Test (correctness of movement of weight training equipment).
10. Concept and experience of core training.
11. Concept and experience of jump training.
12. The concept and experience of agile training.
13. Concept and experience of coordination training.
14. Manual circuit training.
15. Ladder training.
16. Subject examinations.
17. Make-up exam week.
18. Teachers provide flexible teaching.
content.ch:
1. (1)上課進度及注意事項講解。(2)介紹健身運動之基礎概念。
2. 體能檢測 (T字敏捷、伊利諾敏捷、30m、單腳閉眼站立)。
3. 上、下肢重量訓練器材操作說明與體驗。
4. 說明最大肌力檢測之方式，並實際檢測。
5. 重訓器材循環訓練 (分組操作，3 x 30s x 8個動作)。
6. 快速力量訓練、金字塔訓練。
7. 開放式重量訓練器材之教學與體驗 (上肢)。
8. 開放式重量訓練器材之教學與體驗 (下肢)。
9. 測驗 (重量訓練器材之動作正確性)。
10. 核心訓練之概念與體驗。
11. 跳躍訓練之概念與體驗。
12. 敏捷訓練之概念與體驗。
13. 協調訓練之概念與體驗。
14. 徒手循環訓練。
15. 階梯訓練。
16. 學科考試。
17. 補考週。
18. 教師彈性教學。
